name: CLUB Offroad
description:
Ready to go on a journey? CLUB Offroad is the best place for explorers like YOU ! Explore vast types of beautifully created terrains using cool offroad trucks. There will be many obstacles in your path. But, you can face them.

System Requirements 

  • Processor -  anything
  • GPU - more than 4 GBs of Vram
  • Memory - 6 GBs or greater
  • Required space - 2 GBs
